info.title: arXiv API
info.description: API for accessing arXiv's repository of research papers and articles.

get.summary: Search for papers in the arXiv repository.
get.description: Allows searching for papers based on a search query, with additional options for filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: The search query string. Used to search for papers based on titles, authors, abstracts, etc.

parameters.name: id_list
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of arXiv paper IDs to retrieve.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The starting index for the search results, used for pagination.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Which field should be used to sort the results. Default is relevance.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The sort order. Default is descending.

200.description: A successful response containing an Atom feed of papers.

400.description: Bad request, possibly due to invalid query parameters.
